Menu.Name: Town
Menu.Text:
`@Evervale - Town Square `4. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. +-. + `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-' `-'`2 The town of Evervale is alive with the activities of residents. It is difficult to navigate the streets.
`#(E)`5xplore the forest `#(V)`5isit the `!"Three Nosed Dog" `#(B)`5browse `!"Morgath's Weapons and implements of violent Death" `#(L)`5look in `!"Worlibund's Magical Items+ curses and other witchcraftery" `#(N)`5ap under Odin's Oak with the other dregs in the town square. `#(C)`5heck the town posting board. `#(T)`5rain with a partner at `!"Gorban's Gym"
Menu.Prompt: `#So what would you like to do?
